Hi there, it's always nice to have new members join.  Are you planning on writing for the SH meets SH fanfic challenge?  Oh yeah, I 've been wanting to ask this for a long time.  What exactly was the Boshin war?  I've been so confused between all the battle names that I probably got them wrong on my fanfic.  Was it the same as the Meiji revolution, just another name?  Thankx in advance you guys.
~Saitohworship

nakkinomiko12 <LMTame@...> wrote:
I'm new here. I'm thrilled to find a group of people that are as
crazy about Saitou and the Shinsengumi as I am! :-) It's always nice
to find kindred spirits!

It might take me a while before I actually start posting 
anything . . .I'm still sifting through the archives and am 
overwhelmed at all the information I'm finding! 

--L.
